summary: SummaryLanc√¥me's Monsieur Big Volumizing Mascara is a volumizing mascara with a false lash effect providing up to 12x more volume and up to 24H of wear for your most dramatic lashes yet.
details: DetailsFeaturesSay goodbye to fake lashes & eyelash extensions and hello to longer lashesVolumizing & lengthening mascara is smudge-proof and does not flakeSoft brush & wavy fiber bristles deliver high intensity ultra-black pigments, evenly coating each lash for clump-free volumeResearch Results95% agree that it's comfortable to wear all day long*93% found mascara has a good wear without retouching*90% found this mascara does not flake**In a consumer test.Item 2512282How To UsePrep lashes with Lanc√¥me's Cils Booster XL Vitamin-Infused Mascara Primer.Hold Monsieur Big Mascara wand horizontally by lashes.In an upwards swiping motion for top lashes and downward swiping motion for bottom lashes, apply mascara.Layer as desired to achieve 12 times the volume (from bare lashes) and intense black pigment.Pro Tip: Easily remove Monsieur Big Mascara from lashes with Lanc√¥me's Bi-Facil Double-Action Eye Makeup Remover.IngredientsAqua / Water, Paraffin, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Copernicia Cerifera Cera / Carnauba Wax, Ethylene/Acrylic Acid Copolymer, Styrene/Acrylates/Ammonium Methacrylate Copolymer, Cera Alba / Beeswax, Synthetic Beeswax, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Polybutene, Cetyl Alcohol, Steareth-20, Glyceryl Dibehenate, Steareth-2, C12-13 Pareth-23, C12-13 Pareth-3, Tribehenin, Acacia Senegal Gum, Glyceryl Behenate, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Silica, Divinyldimethicone/Dimethicone Copolymer, Disodium EDTA, Hydrogenated Jojoba Oil, Hydrogenated Palm Oil, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Caprylyl Glycol, Tetrasodium EDTA, Ethylenediamine/Stearyl Dimer Dilinoleate Copolymer, Butylene Glycol, BHT, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Phenoxyethanol. May Contain: CI 75470 / Carmine, CI 77007 / Ultramarines, CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 / Iron Oxides.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Prep lashes with Lanc√¥me's Cils Booster XL Vitamin-Infused Mascara Primer.Hold Monsieur Big Mascara wand horizontally by lashes.In an upwards swiping motion for top lashes and downward swiping motion for bottom lashes, apply mascara.Layer as desired to achieve 12 times the volume (from bare lashes) and intense black pigment.Pro Tip: Easily remove Monsieur Big Mascara from lashes with Lanc√¥me's Bi-Facil Double-Action Eye Makeup Remover.

reviews.headline: No I don't like it at all
reviews.comments: It clumps and is thick on my lashes I hate it if I could return it or exchange it that would be great

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: Love the product

reviews.headline: My favorite mascara
reviews.comments: Great buildable mascara. I've tried multiple diff brands and always go back to this one. It doesn't transfer onto my brow bone either which many others do as long as i swipe a little eye shadow on there. Well worth the $$ to me personally.

reviews.headline: I would definitely purchase this product again.
reviews.comments: This is my favorite mascara. I have tried others, but nothing compares to this one.

reviews.headline: Like but don't love
reviews.comments: I really want to love this mascara. It doesn't smudge or flake however it doesn't separate the lashes like it should.

reviews.headline: Average
reviews.comments: Was expecting to be blown away by a luxury mascara and picked this up during the last week of the Ulta sale. Feels good going on however the by the end of the day, I noticed smudges below my eye and mascara marks right below my brow bone. I will finish it up but would not replace.

reviews.headline: Black and Globby
reviews.comments: Mascara was 40% off, and I see why. I've used Lanc√¥me mascara for decades. This is not their usual quality. I wrote to Lanc√¥me after using this. It's very globby. Brush is filled with globs of black.

reviews.headline: Best mascara
reviews.comments: I've been using this mascara for years & I absolutely love it!!! I'll be purchasing again

reviews.headline: Love this Mascara!!!
reviews.comments: I have very sensitive eyes and since I am 50+, my lashes have become sparse.  This formula not only lengthens them, by the 2nd coat, they look twice as thick and without looking clumpy!! It doesn't flake or run by the end of the day and doesnt leave my sensitive eye, dry and red like so many others!

reviews.headline: Awful
reviews.comments: The only good thing about this mascara is the brush.  I have naturally long, curled lashes and this formula makes them look like broken twigs.  I hate it.  It's just clumpy and gross.

reviews.headline: Lanc√¥me Lash Idole is so much better
reviews.comments: This mascara doesn't really make my lashes look much better. It also starts smearing under my eyes within an hour after applying it. And never cry with this or you will look like a clown. I recommed Lamcome Lash Idole instred! I had absolutely no smearing and I dont even use the waterproof one.

reviews.headline: I agree with the cons
reviews.comments: I could see this being great for people who love the clumpy look and apply several times a day or week. so much on the wand

reviews.headline: BEST MASACARA EVER!
reviews.comments: MY ABSOLUTE FAVORITE MASCARA!

reviews.headline: Would not buy again
reviews.comments: This leaves my eye lashes clumpy and sticking together. Not worth the money I spent.

reviews.headline: Run don't walk and buy this product
reviews.comments: This by far is the best mascara I've tried in awhile.

reviews.headline: I would not buy this product again
reviews.comments: I had such high hopes but in less than a week it is a clumpy mess. After paying over $30, I will be looking for a new mascara.

reviews.headline: My favorite mascara
reviews.comments: I love this mascara! It really builds my lashes up. It is comparable to Maybelline Falsies, but high end. I've bought this mascara pretty exclusively since it came out. I have sensitive eyes and it does not bother them.

reviews.headline: Raccoon
reviews.comments: Black under eyes

reviews.headline: Smudges and causes raccoon eyes
reviews.comments: Love the wand but it flakes and I had raccoon eyes by mid day. From afar i saw that my eyes were dark and sunken‚Ä¶ it was the mascara.

reviews.headline: A mascara must for long lashes!
reviews.comments: This mascara and primer are a must for long lashes! I make sure I never run out!!

faceoff_positive.comments: I have almost nonexistent lashes. Im 47 yo and have been looking for a good mascara. Ive tried SO many! THIS is the one for me!! Im a thrifty shopper yet im going to spend alot of $$ on this!! It literally makes my look like i have false lashes on ( in a positive way).
faceoff_positive.headline: Best that ive ever tried!!!

faceoff_negative.comments: I love the way this mascara looks. It is one of the most best looking mascara I have ever used...however... I'm not sure if I'm the only one who is having this problem but if this product gets into my eyes the pain is EXCRUCIATING. I mean almost unbearable pain. I have never experienced eye pain like that with any other product. I am going to go into the store and see if anyone else has said anything and if not I am going to try another tube because maybe I got a bad batch. Hopefully it's just the tube because I love the way it looks!
faceoff_negative.headline: Love the way it looks, but Excruciating Pain..
